channel.title: Small Noble/Aristocrat change and a bigger Apostle change
channel.description:
# Noble/Aristocrat Replace Noble Twins with the following ability:
> Day Ability 2: Reorder - Change the player maid spy is watching to Target player. Can't be used if you didn't set a spy last night. (3 uses)
This allows you to change who's whispers you see mid day a few times. Can also be used if you sent a spy to a dead player. It does NOT however allow you to use the ability if you were to be occupied or prevented for any reason.
# Apostle
Make Cult spy 2 target and add a new passive:
> Passive: Dark whispers - You can talk to the other cultists privately durring the day in a Cult chat tab.
This should help dud spy's without being OP. It also replaces the Weak but pointlessly confirmable Noble Twins and makes it far harder to discover an Apostle during the day.
If someone demands that an Apostle demonstrate knowledge of 2 players Whispers in the same day there are a few options:
1 - Get lucky and have a Spy on the person that demands a test. With 2 targets that's fairly likely by the time you are converted.
2 - Claim to be out of Reorder's
3 - Claim to not have an active Spy for any reason.
The day chat helps even more because you can relay whisper contents through it for either proving or for general planning ect.

item.title: Small Noble/Aristocrat change and a bigger Apostle change
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
NuclearBurrito:

While I am open to the idea I am worried that might be OP.

It’s mainly to discourage the whisper prince meta.

NuclearBurrito:

Also they would need a new Primary ability to replace it.

Frame or defile could work for apostle. Here’s an idea for aristocrat:

Blackmail(unlimited) - Prevent your target from speaking to anyone but yourself. They can do this in a separate chat. You will appear to be “Blackmailer” to them. Also prevents them from voting and accusing.

NuclearBurrito:

Day faction check maybe?

That would still be a bit weak. Maybe bat eyelashes could be changed into a day probe?

Charm(unlimited)(day) - Determine your target’s exact class.
